channel.title: revisions on tanaike
channel.description: Recent content in revisions on tanaike

item.title: Managing History of Google Apps Script
item.description: Gists Abstract This report introduces the method for managing the histories of the Google Apps Script project. Description On August 23, 2023, the project history has been implemented in the new IDE of Google Apps Script. Ref and Ref In the current stage, the users can see the history of the previously deployed script version. This is a very important implementation for a lot of developers. Here, I remember the classic IDE.

item.title: GAS Library - ScriptHistoryApp
item.description: Overview This is a Google Apps Script library for managing the histories of the Google Apps Script project. Description On August 23, 2023, the project history has been implemented in the new IDE of Google Apps Script. Ref and Ref In the current stage, the users can see the history of the previously deployed script version. This is a very important implementation for a lot of developers. Here, I remember the classic IDE.
